      • downloadProtein

        public void downloadProtein(Species sp)
                     throws IOException,
                            InterruptedException
        This method downloads UniProt, IntAct and Interpro data from EMBL-EBI.
        Parameters:
        sp - species to load data for
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error writing to a file
        InterruptedException - if there is an error downloading files

      • downloadConservation

        public void downloadConservation(Species species,
                                 String assembly,
                                 Path speciesFolder)
                          throws IOException,
                                 InterruptedException
        This method downloads bith PhastCons and PhyloP data from UCSC for Human and Mouse species.
        Parameters:
        species - The Species object to download the data
        assembly - The assembly required
        speciesFolder - Output folder to download the data
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error writing to a file
        InterruptedException - if there is an error downloading files
